body.p: There should be two groups created, one for each composite activity. The first is the most standard way composite_activity is used: block level content with one or more inline references. The second one is a form used in chemistry where it is just a collection of block elements and there is are no inline references.

composite_activity.p:
25.0 mL of 0.250 M hypochlorous acid, HClO, is titrated with 0.200 M NaOH. At each of the following volumes of titrant added: 0.00 mL, 25.00 mL, 31.25 mL, 35.00 mL.
K
a
= 2.9×10
−8
